[[File:Demons from Uncanny X-Men Vol 2 13 0001.png|thumb|left|359px|Dominating the Planet]]
===Evolution stopped===
A billion years ago, the Demon Lords of Stasis were commanding on their planet, under a violent rule.

Their worst fear being Progress, they processed a [[M-Day|great rite]] in order to stop the Evolution.

[[File:Five Lights (Demons) (Earth-616) from Uncanny X-Men Vol 2 13 0001.png|thumb|right|300px|[[Phoenix Messiah (Demon) (Earth-616)|Phoenix Messiah]] & [[Lights (Demons) (Earth-616)|Lights]]]]
===The Messiah and the Lights===
The rite proved to be effective, until the emerging of the [[Phoenix Messiah (Demon) (Earth-616)|Phoenix Messiah]] who gathered five acolytes, the [[Lights (Demons) (Earth-616)|Lights]]. All of them were powered beings, but their origins are unknown.

Together, they waged rebellion against the Lord of Stasis, and at last, the [[Phoenix Force (Earth-616)|Phoenix Force]] came to them, and they communed, although the Demon Lords fought to prevent that union from happening.

[[File:Phoenix Messiah (Demon) (Earth-616) from Uncanny X-Men Vol 2 13 0004.png|thumb|left|330px|Burned by the [[Phoenix Force (Earth-616)|Phoenix]]]]
===Evolution restarting===
The spell was broken by the Five and One and the Phoenix Force, and the Demons were swept away.

The whole history was witnessed by the alien peace-keeping robot [[Unit (Earth-616)|Unit]], who intended to witness a billion years later a variant of that story by observing [[Hope Summers (Earth-616)|Hope Summers]], the [[Mutant Messiah]], without her own [[Lights (Earth-616)|Lights]].{{r|Uncanny X-Men Vol 2 13}}
